AI Studio Uganda
Playground Developers Research Impact

Building the Digital Economy

Our work goes beyond code. We are creating jobs, preserving culture, and digitizing the nation's knowledge base.

Data Digitization Initiative

We employ hundreds of young graduates to digitize and annotate local language texts. This massive undertaking is creating the high-quality datasets needed to train world-class models.

Goal: 1 Million digitized pages by 2026.

500+

Jobs Created

Local Language Book Sourcing

Partnering with libraries and authors across Uganda to bring physical books into the digital age. We ensure fair compensation for copyright holders.

Partner With Us
